structure.unit: ARTICLE V. PUBLIC NUISANCES ON LEASED PROPERTY

law.catch_line: Tenant's obligation to maintain dwelling unit.

text.section:
Sec. 17-83. Tenant's obligation to maintain dwelling unit.
In addition to those requirements imposed by Section 83.52, Florida Statutes, tenant shall not use the premises or any part thereof for the purposes of engaging in any public nuisance.
